computer_extension_attribute.name: Jamf Protect - Plan ID
computer_extension_attribute.description: Displays the Plan ID specified by Jamf Protect

input_type.script:
#!/bin/sh
#Jamf Protect Location jamfProtectBinaryLocation="/usr/local/bin/protectctl"
if [ -f "$jamfProtectBinaryLocation" ]; then jamfProtectPlanID=$("$jamfProtectBinaryLocation" info | sed -n '1 p' | awk -F 'Plan ID: ' '{print $2}' | xargs) else jamfProtectPlanID="Does not exist" fi
echo "jamfProtectPlanID" echo "<result>$jamfProtectPlanID</result>"
